titles: Farther additions to a small treatise called Salt-water sweetned shewing the great advantages both by sea and land of sea-water made fresh : together with the Honourable Mr. Boyle's letter and the approbation of the Colledge of Physicians of the wholesomeness of this water.
author: Fitzgerald, R. (Robert)
Boyle, Robert, 1627-1691.
Fitzgerald, R. (Robert). Salt-water sweetned.
notes: Written by Robert Fitzgerald.  Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
keywords: Saline water conversion --  Early works to 1800.
